roleset.name: be bothered by
roleset.note: MIND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mind' based on sentences in corpus and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from mind.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: normal
example.text: You have a right to read Voice of America scripts if you don't mind traveling to Washington every week or so and visiting the Voice office during business hours.
example.arg: traveling to Washington every week or so and visiting the Voice office during business hours

example.name: unstated or inconveniently-treed arg1
example.text: He said Apple's family of Macintosh computers, for instance, uses four different buses ``and [no one]-1 seems *trace*-1 to mind.''

roleset.name: take care of, tend to
roleset.note: MIND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mind' based on sentences in corpus and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from mind.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: mind the baby
example.text: The first episode concluded with a marvelously cute scene in which the trading-room crew minded a baby, the casualty of a broken marriage at the firm.
example.arg: a baby, the casualty of a broken marriage at the firm

roleset.name: make a note of, watch yourself!
roleset.note: MIND-V NOTES: This hardly even deserves to be called a predicate--it's more of afixed phrase. (from mind.03-v)

example.name: funky inverted discourse function
example.text: A modest drop in the dollar -- only a modest one, *PRO* mind you -- would be welcomed by the U.S.

example.name: another discourse syntax
example.text: *PRO* Mind you, most of ``the volunteers'' would be unskilled 17- to 18-year-olds, some not even high school graduates, and many saving money by living at home.

example.name: never mind
example.text: As for Alberto Contador i do nt like cheats winning he should not of been in the tour last year never mind this year

roleset.name: intend
roleset.note: MIND-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from mind.01-n)

example.name: Arg 1
example.text: He had in mind to see his old high school teacher
example.arg: to see his old high school teacher

roleset.name: opinion
roleset.note: MIND-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from mind.02-n)

example.name: arg 0
example.text: Is this going to change the mind of the one who killed you?
example.arg: of the one who killed you?
